column5: Hi all, looking for some suggestions for a weekend getaway. Wife and I are looking for a cottage resort that's pet friendly and has boat rentals either in the southern Georgian Bay area (Port Severn, Honey Harbour) or Trenton area.  Any suggestions would be helpful.
Try HomeAway bud.  That's what I used to get our cottage in October on Buckhorn.  I'm sure there's marinas close by where you can rent a boat.
Just about any resort in the quinte region  http://bayofquinte.com/site/business-directory-2/fishing-resorts/  G
Try the old method. Throw a dart at the map and chase it down. Ya never know? Don
